mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply(user_id, event_id, ticket_id, applicant_num, phone) VALUES(#{userId}, #{eventId}, #{ticketId}, #{applicantNum}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS result FROM apply WHERE id = #{applyId}

SELECT A.event_id AS eventId, A.ticket_id AS ticketId, A.applicant_num AS applicantNum, A.phone, A.apply_date AS applyDate, A.delete_date AS deleteDate, A.id AS applyId FROM apply AS A INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM apply AS apply WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY event_id) AS AG ON A.id = AG.id;
SELECT ticket_id AS ticketId, SUM(applicant_num) as usingCount FROM apply WHERE 1=1 AND event_id = #{eventId} AND delete_date IS NULL GROUP BY ticket_id;
